attacks.name: Damage Burn
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Minor Errand-Running
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a basic Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Drawup Power
attacks.effect: Search your deck for an Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Front Spark
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Firebreathing
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.

cards.name: Celio's Network
cards.effect: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon or Evolution card (excluding Pokémon-ex), show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

cards.name: Energy Search
cards.effect: Search your deck for a basic Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

cards.name: Potion
cards.effect: Remove 2 damage counters from 1 of your Pokémon (remove 1 damage counter if that Pokémon has only 1).
